verses.verse: "Roam <S%H7751><s%> to and fro <S%H7751><s%> through the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> And look <S%H7200><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and take <S%H3045><s%> note. <S%H3045><s%> And seek <S%H1245><s%> in her open <S%H7339><s%> squares, <S%H7339><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you can find <S%H4672><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> If <S%H518><s%> there <S%H3426><s%> is one who does <S%H6213><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> who seeks <S%H1245><s%> truth, <S%H530><s%> Then I will pardon <S%H5545><s%> her.
"And although <S%H518><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> 'As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%>' Surely <S%H3651><s%> they swear <S%H7650><s%> falsely. <S%H8267><s%>"

O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> do not Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> look for truth <S%H530><s%>? Thou hast smitten <S%H5221><s%> them, [But] they did not weaken; <S%H2470><s%> Thou hast consumed <S%H3615><s%> them, But they refused <S%H3985><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> correction. <S%H4148><s%> They have made <S%H2388><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> harder <S%H2388><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> rock; <S%H5553><s%> They have refused <S%H3985><s%> to repent. <S%H7725><s%>

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "They are only <S%H389><s%> the poor, <S%H1800><s%> They are foolish; <S%H2973><s%> For they do not know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> [Or] the ordinance <S%H4941><s%> of their God. <S%H430><s%>

"I will go <S%H1980><s%> to the great <S%H1419><s%> And will speak <S%H1696><s%> to them, For they know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [And] the ordinance <S%H4941><s%> of their God. <S%H430><s%>" But they too, with one <S%H3162><s%> accord, <S%H3162><s%> have broken <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> [And] burst <S%H5423><s%> the bonds. <S%H4147><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> a lion <S%H9030><s%> from the forest <S%H9194><s%> shall slay <S%H5221><s%> them, A wolf <S%H2061><s%> of the deserts <S%H6160><s%> shall destroy <S%H7703><s%> them, A leopard <S%H5246><s%> is watching <S%H8245><s%> their cities. <S%H5892><s%> Everyone <S%H3605><s%> who goes <S%H3318><s%> out of them shall be torn <S%H2963><s%> in pieces, <S%H2963><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are many, <S%H7231><s%> Their apostasies <S%H4878><s%> are numerous. <S%H6105><s%>

"Why <S%H335><s%> should I pardon <S%H5545><s%> you? Your sons <S%H1121><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> Me And sworn <S%H7650><s%> by those who are not gods. <S%H430><s%> When I had fed <S%H7646><s%> them to the full, <S%H7646><s%> They committed <S%H5003><s%> adultery <S%H5003><s%> And trooped <S%H1413><s%> to the harlot's house. <S%H1004><s%>
"They were well-fed lusty <S%H7904><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> Each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> neighing <S%H6670><s%> after <S%H413><s%> his neighbor's wife. <S%H802><s%>

"Shall I not punish <S%H6485><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [people,]" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "And on a nation <S%H1471><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as this <S%H2088><s%> Shall I not avenge <S%H5358><s%> Myself <S%H5315><s%>?

"Go <S%H5927><s%> up through her vine <S%H9595><s%> rows <S%H9595><s%> and destroy, <S%H7843><s%> But do not execute <S%H6213><s%> a complete <S%H3617><s%> destruction; <S%H3617><s%> Strip <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> her branches, <S%H5189><s%> For they are not the Lord's.

"For the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> Have dealt <S%H898><s%> very <S%H898><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> with Me," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

They have lied <S%H3584><s%> about the Lord <S%H3068><s%> And said, <S%H559><s%> "Not He; Misfortune <S%H9567><s%> will not come <S%H935><s%> on us; And we will not see <S%H7200><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> or famine. <S%H7458><s%>
"And the prophets <S%H5030><s%> are [as] wind, <S%H7307><s%> And the word <S%H1699><s%> is not in them. Thus <S%H3541><s%> it will be done <S%H6213><s%> to them!"

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word, <S%H1697><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am making <S%H5414><s%> My words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth <S%H6310><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> And this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and it will consume <S%H398><s%> them.

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am bringing <S%H935><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you from afar, <S%H4801><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> "It is an enduring <S%H386><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> It is an ancient <S%H5769><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> A nation <S%H1471><s%> whose language <S%H3956><s%> you do not know, <S%H3045><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> can you understand <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> they say. <S%H1696><s%>
"Their quiver <S%H827><s%> is like an open <S%H6605><s%> grave, <S%H6913><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> of them are mighty <S%H1368><s%> men. <S%H1368><s%>

"And they will devour <S%H398><s%> your harvest <S%H7105><s%> and your food; <S%H3899><s%> They will devour <S%H398><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters; <S%H1323><s%> They will devour <S%H398><s%> your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds; <S%H1241><s%> They will devour <S%H398><s%> your vines <S%H1612><s%> and your fig <S%H8384><s%> trees; <S%H8384><s%> They will demolish <S%H7567><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> your fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you trust. <S%H982><s%>

"Yet even <S%H1571><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "I will not make <S%H6213><s%> you a complete <S%H3617><s%> destruction. <S%H3617><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> 'Why <S%H8478><s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> to us?' then you shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'As you have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> Me and served <S%H5647><s%> foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> in a land <S%H776><s%> that is not yours.'
"Declare <S%H5046><s%> this <S%H384><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> And proclaim <S%H8085><s%> it in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

'Hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H384><s%> O foolish <S%H5530><s%> and senseless <S%H369><s%> <S%H3820><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> Who have eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but see <S%H7200><s%> not; Who have ears, <S%H241><s%> but hear <S%H8085><s%> not.

'Do you not fear <S%H3372><s%> Me?' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> 'Do you not tremble <S%H9123><s%> in My presence <S%H6440><s%>? For I have placed <S%H7760><s%> the sand <S%H2344><s%> as a boundary <S%H1366><s%> for the sea, <S%H3220><s%> An eternal <S%H5769><s%> decree, <S%H2706><s%> so it cannot <S%H3808><s%> cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> it. Though the waves <S%H1530><s%> toss, <S%H1607><s%> yet they cannot <S%H3808><s%> prevail; <S%H3201><s%> Though they roar, <S%H1993><s%> yet they cannot <S%H3808><s%> cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> it.

'But this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> has <S%H1961><s%> a stubborn <S%H5637><s%> and rebellious <S%H4784><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> They have turned <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> and departed. <S%H1980><s%>

'They do not say <S%H559><s%> in their heart, <S%H3824><s%> "Let us now <S%H4994><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> Who gives <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> in its season, <S%H6256><s%> Both the autumn <S%H3138><s%> rain <S%H3138><s%> and the spring <S%H4456><s%> rain, <S%H4456><s%> Who keeps <S%H8104><s%> for us The appointed <S%H2708><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> of the harvest. <S%H7105><s%>"
'Your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have turned <S%H5186><s%> these <S%H428><s%> away, <S%H5186><s%> And your sins <S%H9128><s%> have withheld <S%H4513><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> from you.

'For wicked <S%H7563><s%> men <S%H7563><s%> are found <S%H4672><s%> among My people, <S%H5971><s%> They watch <S%H7789><s%> like fowlers <S%H3353><s%> lying <S%H7918><s%> in wait; <S%H7918><s%> They set <S%H7843><s%> a trap, <S%H4889><s%> They catch <S%H3920><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

'Like a cage <S%H3619><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of birds, <S%H5775><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%> are full <S%H4392><s%> of deceit; <S%H4820><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they have become <S%H1431><s%> great <S%H1431><s%> and rich. <S%H6238><s%>

'They are fat, <S%H8080><s%> they are sleek, <S%H6245><s%> They also <S%H1571><s%> excel <S%H5674><s%> in deeds <S%H1697><s%> of wickedness; <S%H9563><s%> They do not plead <S%H1777><s%> the cause, <S%H1779><s%> The cause <S%H1779><s%> of the orphan, <S%H3490><s%> that they may prosper; <S%H6743><s%> And they do not defend <S%H8199><s%> the rights <S%H4941><s%> of the poor. <S%H34><s%>

'Shall I not punish <S%H6485><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [people?'] declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'On a nation <S%H1471><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as this <S%H2088><s%> Shall I not avenge <S%H5358><s%> Myself <S%H5315><s%>?'
"An appalling <S%H8047><s%> and horrible <S%H8186><s%> thing <S%H8186><s%> Has happened <S%H1961><s%> in the land: <S%H776><s%>

The prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> falsely, <S%H8267><s%> And the priests <S%H3548><s%> rule <S%H7287><s%> on their [own] authority; <S%H3027><s%> And My people <S%H5971><s%> love <S%H157><s%> it so! <S%H3651><s%> But what <S%H4100><s%> will you do <S%H6213><s%> at the end <S%H319><s%> of it?
